hadiths.text: Tariq bin Abdullah Al-Muharibi narrated that :the Messenger of Allah said: "When you are in Salat then do not spit on your right, but behind you or toward your left, or under your left foot

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبُزَاقِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: (What Has Been Related) About It Being Disliked To Spit In The Masjid
